channel.title: Avtex (Intense Records) Drum & Bass
channel.description: 100% pure, wholesome Drum & Bass goodness. No chit-chat, no MCs, just the beats..
channel.itunes:subtitle: Drum & Bass
channel.itunes:author: Avtex
channel.itunes:summary: 100% pure, wholesome Drum & Bass goodness. No chit-chat, no MCs, just the beats..
